Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Adam H. Sparks. Maintainer, author.

  • Zhanglong Cao. Author.
    Wrote original `create_table_3()`.

  • Braden Thorne. Author.
    Contributed the Shiny app for generating IPPO register tables.

  • Curtin University. Funder, copyright holder.
    Provided support through Adam Sparks's, Zhanglong Cao's and Braden Thorne's time.

  • Grains Research and Development Corporation. Funder, copyright holder.
    GRDC Project CUR2210-005OPX (AAGI-CU)
